testcase.classname: Verify createItems button in Item Sub menu
testcase.name: Verify That user should be able to click on the Create Item
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in In portal using "ob","1234567890" and "ob"..........passed And User is on the Home Page................................................passed And Click on the items from left menu.......................................passed And Click on the items from items Submenu...................................passed Then User should be able to click on Create New Item button.................passed

testcase.name: Verify that User should able to login with correct Username ,Domain and Password
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Login page.............................................passed And Enter the "ob" name.....................................................passed And Click on the Continue button............................................passed When I check for the mobilenumber and password page.........................passed And Enter the "1234567890" and "ob".........................................passed And Click on the signin button..............................................passed Then User should be login into the WCMS portal..............................passed

testcase.classname: Verify the negative Scenarios for Create Item Page
testcase.name: Verify That user should be not allowed to submit blank create Item form
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in In portal using "ob","1234567890" and "ob"..........passed And Navigate to the Create Items Page.......................................passed Then submit the blank form user should not allowed to proceed further.......passed

testcase.classname: Verify the negative Scenarios for Create Item Page
testcase.name: Verifiy that char value should not be allowed in Hieght,wieght,length and breath filds
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in In portal using "ob","1234567890" and "ob"..........passed And Navigate to the Create Items Page.......................................passed And enter the char value should not be allowed in Hieght,wieght,length and breath filds.passed And Click on save button....................................................passed Then Error should be thrown.................................................passed
